price: 10. Waxay caasiyeen Rasuulkii Rabbigood (Luud iyo Muuse), markaasuu (Alle) qabtay 'ciqaabay' qabasho 'ciqaab' daran.
arabic: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣaw rasūla rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rābiyatan
